headline: Deep-Fried Peanuts
name: Deep-Fried Peanuts
description: Try these deep-fried peanuts that are easy to make for a Southern delicacy and an excellent crowd-pleasing snack or appetizer.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Cook peanuts in preheated oil until fragrant and hot, about 2 minutes. Transfer to paper towel-lined plates to drain. Season peanuts with salt.
